001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.io.TempDir;
006
007import java.io.*;
008
009import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
010import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
011
012public class SurveyTest {
013  @Test
014  void setNonEmptyValue() {
015    Student student = new Student("test");
016    String nonEmptyFirstName = "firstName";
017
018    Survey.setValueIfNotEmpty(nonEmptyFirstName, student::setFirstName);
019
020    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(nonEmptyFirstName));
021  }
022
023  @Test
024  void setNullValue() {
025    Student student = new Student("test");
026    String nonNullValue = "nonNullValue";
027    student.setFirstName(nonNullValue);
028
029    Survey.setValueIfNotEmpty(null, student::setFirstName);
030
031    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(nonNullValue));
032  }
033
034  @Test
035  void setEmptyValue() {
036    Student student = new Student("test");
037    String nonEmptyValue = "nonEmptyValue";
038    student.setFirstName(nonEmptyValue);
039
040    Survey.setValueIfNotEmpty("", student::setFirstName);
041
042    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(nonEmptyValue));
043  }
044
045  @Test
046  void longMessageIsBrokenInto80CharacterLines() {
047    String message = "This is a long sentence that contains more than 80 characters. " +
048      "Somewhere in here it should be broken into multiple lines of 80 characters each.";
049
050    String lines = Survey.breakUpInto80CharacterLines(message);
051
052    assertThat(lines, not(startsWith(" ")));
053    assertThat(lines, containsString("here\nit"));
054  }
055
056  @Test
057  void validEmailAddressIsValid() {
058    String address = "whitlock@cs.pdx.edu";
059    assertThat(Survey.isEmailAddress(address), equalTo(true));
060  }
061
062  @Test
063  void invalidEmailAddressIsInvalid() {
064    String address = "whitlock";
065    assertThat(Survey.isEmailAddress(address), equalTo(false));
066  }
067
068  @Test
069  void successfulSurveyWritesStudentXmlFile(@TempDir File tempDir) throws IOException, ParserException {
070    String firstName = "First name";
071    String lastName = "Last name";
072    String nickName = "Nick name";
073    String loginId = "LoginId";
074    String email = "email@email.com";
075    String major = "Major";
076    String section = "u";
077    String learn = "A lot";
078    String anythingElse = "Nope";
079    String verify = "y";
080
081    InputStream in = getInputStreamWithLinesOfText(firstName, lastName, nickName, loginId, email, major, section, learn, anythingElse, verify);
082
083    Survey survey = new Survey(new TextCapturingOutputStream().getPrintStream(), new TextCapturingOutputStream().getPrintStream(), in, tempDir);
084    survey.takeSurvey("-noEmail");
085
086    File xmlFile = new File(tempDir, Survey.STUDENT_XML_FILE_NAME);
087    XmlStudentParser parser = new XmlStudentParser(xmlFile);
088    Student student = parser.parseStudent();
089
090    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(firstName));
091    assertThat(student.getLastName(), equalTo(lastName));
092    assertThat(student.getNickName(), equalTo(nickName));
093    assertThat(student.getId(), equalTo(loginId));
094    assertThat(student.getEmail(), equalTo(email));
095    assertThat(student.getMajor(), equalTo(major));
096    assertThat(student.getEnrolledSection(), equalTo(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE));
097  }
098
099  private InputStream getInputStreamWithLinesOfText(String... lines) {
100    ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
101    PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(baos, true);
102    for (String line : lines) {
103      pw.println(line);
104    }
105    byte[] bytes = baos.toByteArray();
106    return new ByteArrayInputStream(bytes);
107  }
108
109  private static class TextCapturingOutputStream {
110    private final OutputStream captured = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
111
112    public PrintStream getPrintStream() {
113      return new PrintStream(captured);
114    }
115  }
116}
